data.title: End of the day sunset
data.meta_description: Louis Dallaras fine art photo collection of Sunsets
data.text:
Fine Art Sunset Photography

Sunset or sundown is the daily disappearance of the Sun below the horizon as a result of Earth’s rotation. The Sun will set exactly due west at the equator on the spring and fall equinoxes, each of which occurs only once a year.

Basic Tips

The camera settings that Improve Photography recommends for a beginning photographer are:

– Shoot in aperture priority mode (A or AV on your mode dial)

– Put the camera on a tripod

– Set your aperture to f/16

– Set your ISO to 100

– Let the camera set your shutter speed

– Put the focus point 1/3 into the scene

Links to help you go deeper into sunset photography

https://www.format.com/magazine/resources/photography/sunset-photography

Sunset-photography-camera-settings-beginners

Update 3-23-2022

It was my birthday evening and my wife and I decided to go to Cape May Point to enjoy a beautiful sunset. I hope you like it. Please leave comments.

A beautiful location for sunrise or sunset is Monument valley, Navajo County, Arizona. The silence in the valley is golden, I have never found a more quiet and golden source of light in the valley.

Another of my favorite places to watch the sunset and enjoy nature at the max is Shenandoah Valley, Skyline Drive, Sunset, VA

Another one from Shenandoah Valley, Skyline Drive, VA at Sky land

Fishing boats at Cape May Marina

Fishing boats at Cape May Marina

Sunset at Valley Forge State Park

The best sunset quotes of all time

Sunset is the opening music of the night.

Every sunset brings the promise of a new dawn.

Every sunset is an opportunity to reset.

Twilight drops her curtain down and pins it with a star.

It is almost impossible to watch a sunset and not dream.
